Hello #

This is my always wip personal webpage. You could click here to see what it looks like.

For now, It use vitepress & Vue & TypeScript to build.

Highlights #

  • [x] pagination
  • [x] dark mode
  • [x] archives
  • [x] tags
  • [x] content level
  • [x] comments
  • [x] lastUpdated
  • [x] github actions
  • [x] mobile + desktop

Start #

git clone
yarn
yarn dev
